sentences.sentence: Pretend as if rigor mortis has set in.
That (plus other things such as election rigging) has left Belarus’s application with rigor mortis.
sentences.translation: 这（以及操纵选举等其它情形）令白俄罗斯加入该委员会的申请决无生机。

sentences.sentence: Some of the smallest asteroids seen orbiting Lola Sayu are re-textured rocks seen floating over Mortis or Iego.
sentences.translation: 沿洛拉萨尤轨道运动的一些最小的小行星，是漂浮在莫蒂斯或耶果上空的岩石的再改造。
